# go-box
A set of powerful data structures and algorithms for [Go](https://golang.org) applications.

## Data Structures
| Package   | Type  | Constructor  |
| --------- | ----- | ------------ |
| `ds`      | Stack | NewStack()   |
| `ds`      | Queue | NewQueue()   |
| `ds/heap` | Heap  | NewMinHeap() |
| `ds/heap` | Heap  | NewMacHeap() |

## Sorting Algorithms
| Algorithm       |
| --------------- |
| InsertionSort() |
| ShellSort()     |
| MergeSort()     |
| HeapSort()      |
| QuickSort()     |
| QuickSort3Way() |
